My problem is, if they have like…let’s say 5 pk points, they can click it 5 times and get 500% special. So in other words, they can mass click it to stack special attack.

How can I make it so they can only click the altar every 2 minutes or so?

Here’s the code.

case 13199: if (c.pkPoints >= 1) { c.specAmount+=10; c.pkPoints-=1; c.sendMessage("You exchange 1 Pk point for full special."); c.startAnimation(645); return; } else if (c.pkPoints <=1) { c.sendMessage("You need 1 Pk point to recharge your special attack!"); } break;

Thanks in advanced, Tyler
